description: The blue cheese adds an interesting twist to this grilled watermelon salad.
name: Watermelon, Blue Cheese & Feta Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium watermelon, skin removed, de-seeded and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a chargrill to a medium heat with the canola oil. Grill the watermelon slices with the seasoning for about 4 minutes on each side until nicely browned but not burnt.
Mix the rest of the ingredients in a bowl together. Place your rocket on the plate, top with some the grilled watermelon and then the mixed salad on top.
